bodyEn: Soft merino super fine wool is thin and tender to the touch. Scarves are felted from soft merino sheep wool on a silk base and decorated with different silk and decorative fibers.
bodyEt: Super pehme merino vill on puudutades õrn ja õhuke. Sallid on vilditud merino villaga siidist kangale, kaunistatud erinevate siidi ja muude dekoratiivsete kiududega.
